version_description:
- Sometimes you were unable to add some feeds ending with the word "feed/", but now you can :)
- Fixed markdown and plaintext copy on the article screen.
- Improved unsave article function, all the leftover will be deleted from your device as soon as you unsave!

- Sometimes you were unable to add some feeds ending with the word "feed/", but now you can :)
- Fixed markdown and plaintext copy on the article screen.
- Improved unsave article function, all the leftover will be deleted from your device as soon as you unsave!

BIG UPDATE! You must BACKUP (export OPML) your feed first.

- New homepage UI.
- Landscape support.
- Dropdown alert on full-text updates.
- Switch to next article.
- iOS 13 crash fix and enhancements.
- Better junk file handling.
- Now you can mark all items of current view as read or unread.
- Smaller build size, around 67% reduction.
- Noticeably faster overall performance.
- Some feeds were weird and the app would crash. This should be fixed now.
- Other minor changes, fix and improvements here and there.

BIG UPDATE! You must BACKUP (export OPML) your feed first.

- New homepage UI.
- Landscape support.
- Dropdown alert on full-text updates.
- Switch to next article.
- iOS 13 crash fix and enhancements.
- Better junk file handling.
- Now you can mark all items of current view as read or unread.
- Smaller build size, around 67% reduction.
- Noticeably faster overall performance.
- Some feeds were weird and the app would crash. This should be fixed now.
- Other minor changes, fix and improvements here and there.

This update fixes mark all read/unread and long delay on updates.

- Improved partial feed detection and faster updates!
- Now you can swipe right or left to change articles :)
- New storage adapter for faster performance.
- Fixed date issue.

This update fixes mark all read/unread and long delay on updates.

- Improved partial feed detection and faster updates!
- Now you can swipe right or left to change articles :)
- New storage adapter for faster performance.
- Fixed date issue.

- Dark theme updated. Switch between themes to take effect.
- Mark all read and unread performance improvements.
- Thumbnail size updated to reduce bandwidth usage.
- Other minor improvements.

- Dark theme updated. Switch between themes to take effect.
- Mark all read and unread performance improvements.
- Thumbnail size updated to reduce bandwidth usage.
- Other minor improvements.
